title: Is it strange for a male teacher to teach at an all-girls school? - Quora

response.answer_text: Um, no. To clarify, I study at an all-girls school, and we have multiple male teachers teaching at our school. Sure, most of them gravitate towards the more science-based subjects (Chemistry, Physics, Biology, Mathematics, Geography etc), but we’ve had two arts teachers, a music teacher, and a Chinese teacher too. Is it strange for a female teacher to teach at an all-boys school? Hell no. The sex of the students shouldn’t make a difference. What matters is quality of teaching and whether students actually learn. I’d rather have a male teacher who invigorates my passion for the subject than a female teacher who can’t do jack shit.
